description: The status of an application for legal aid funding

reference.description: The human readable reference to the application supplied by legal aid agency

id.description: Reference data identifer for the agreed status

status_code.description: The status code from reference data

description.description: The status description from reference data

date.description: The date that the status was recorded

effective_start_date.description: The start date for legal aid, set when the status represents an approved representation order

effective_end_date.description: The end date for legal aid, set when the status represents an approved representation order

laa_contract_number.description: this will be null when LAA reference is recorded and will be set when representation order is received
